The program "[Dis, pourquoi?](https://www.rts.ch/audio-podcast/2021/emission/dis-pourquoi-25785419.html)" on RTS^[Radio Télévision Suisse] devoted the last two weeks to geospatial topics: 

From April 21 to April 25, the show aired five episodes focused on **toponyms**^[place names] **and toponymy**^[the study of place names], featuring [Frédéric Giraut](https://www.unige.ch/sciences-societe/geo/membres/enseignants/girautfrederic), professor of human geography at the University of Geneva and coordinator of the [UNESCO chair in inclusive toponymy "Naming the World"](https://www.unige.ch/medias/en/2021/une-nouvelle-chaire-unesco-en-toponymie-inclusive) (all episodes are in French):

- Toponymy 1/5: [What is toponymy?](https://www.rts.ch/audio-podcast/2025/audio/qu-est-ce-que-la-toponymie-toponymie-1-5-28860393.html)
- Toponymy 2/5: [What are the challenges of toponymy?](https://www.rts.ch/audio-podcast/2025/audio/quels-sont-les-enjeux-de-la-toponymie-toponymie-2-5-28861317.html)
- Toponymy 3/5: [Do we need to rename streets?](https://www.rts.ch/audio-podcast/2025/audio/faut-il-rebaptiser-les-noms-de-rue-toponymie-3-5-28862228.html)
- Toponymy 4/5: [What is addressing?](https://www.rts.ch/audio-podcast/2025/audio/qu-est-ce-que-l-adressage-toponymie-4-5-28863339.html)
- Toponymy 5/5: [What are the challenges of toponymy in the Global South?](https://www.rts.ch/audio-podcast/2025/audio/quels-sont-les-enjeux-de-la-toponymie-dans-le-sud-toponymie-5-5-28864229.html)

From April 28 to May 2, the program presented five episodes on **maps**, exploring their history, current production, and future, with Pascal Marguerat, cartographer at Swisstopo, the Swiss Federal Office of Topography, and [Raphaël Bovier](https://www.linkedin.com/in/raphaël-bovier-3894199/), responsible for digital data distribution at Swisstopo (these episodes are also in French):

- Maps 1/5: [What is a map?](https://www.rts.ch/audio-podcast/2025/audio/qu-est-ce-qu-une-carte-cartes-1-5-28866840.html)
- Maps 2/5: [What is the history of cartography?](https://www.rts.ch/audio-podcast/2025/audio/quelle-est-l-histoire-de-la-cartographie-cartes-2-5-28867894.html)
- Maps 3/5: [What do maps tell?](https://www.rts.ch/audio-podcast/2025/audio/que-racontent-les-cartes-cartes-3-5-28868969.html)
- Maps 4/5: [How do you produce a map today?](https://www.rts.ch/audio-podcast/2025/audio/comment-fait-on-une-carte-aujourd-hui-cartes-4-5-28870002.html)
- Maps 5/5: [What is the future of cartography?](https://www.rts.ch/audio-podcast/2025/audio/quel-est-le-futur-de-la-cartographie-cartes-5-5-28871164.html)
